  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sdt.sulinet.hu:ef84072c-200c-4cda-8e7c-e6308932c4d2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>sdt.sulinet.hu</catalog>
            <entry>ef84072c-200c-4cda-8e7c-e6308932c4d2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Centaurus A</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Centauri A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Centauri A</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">A Centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O A Centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">A Centauri</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το centauri Α</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La A Centauri</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A Centaurus A magjának szerkezete a Hubble Űrtávcső mérései alapján. Az aktív galaxismag valószínűleg két galaxis ütközése során jött létre.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Structure of the core of Centauri A on the basis of the measurement of the Hubble Telescope. Presumably the active galaxy core was created as a result of the collision of two galaxies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagászat</string>
            <string language="en-US">astronomy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">Centaurus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">galaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csillagrendszer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">spirálgalaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">spirál</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur des Kernes von centauri A auf der 
Grundlage von das Messen des Hubble Teleskops. Vermutlich wurde 
der aktive Galaxiekern resultierend aus dem Zusammenstoß von zwei 
Galaxien erstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure du noyau de A centauri sur la base de la 
mesure du télescope de Hubble. Vraisemblablement le noyau actif
de galaxie a été créé en raison de la collision de deux galaxies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura do núcleo de A centauri na base da 
medida do telescópio de Hubble. O núcleo ativo da galáxia foi
criado presumably em conseqüência da colisão de duas galáxias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura del nucleo di A centauri in base alla 
misura del telescopio di Hubble. Presumibilmente il nucleo 
attivo della galassia è stato creato come conseguenza dello scontro 
di due galassie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή του πυρήνα του centauri Α βάσει της μέτρησης 
του τηλεσκοπίου Hubble. Πιθανώς ο ενεργός πυρήνας 
γαλαξιών δημιουργήθηκε ως αποτέλεσμα της σύγκρουσης δύο 
γαλαξιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de la base de A centauri en base de la 
medida del telescopio de Hubble. La base activa de la galaxia 
fue creada probablemente como resultado de la colisión de dos 
galaxias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">astronomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">astronomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αστρονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">astronomía</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
